SystemColumn.Formula: "Claim #" & [ClaimID] & ", " & [Date of Issue] & ", " & NUMBERFORMAT([Total Net Amount Payable], "C")

Column.Name: Original Contract Sum
Column.Formula: IFERROR( DB_LOOKUP( "Initial Contract Value Excl. Tax", "Contract", "[RecordID] = " & [Contract RecordID] ), 0 )

Column.Name: Approved Variations
Adjusted Contract Sum
Column.Formula: [Original Contract Sum] + [Approved Variations]

Column.Name: Value of Contract Works Completed to Date
Column.Formula: [Total Value]

Column.Name: Total Deductions
Column.Formula: [Less Liquidated Damages] + [Less Retention Sum] + [Less Minor Omissions and Defects] + [Less Other Deductions]

Column.Name: Total Amount Payable to Date
Column.Formula: [Value of Contract Works Completed to Date] - [Total Deductions]

Column.Name: Less Net Value Certified at Previous Progress Certificate
Column.Formula: COALESCE([Most Recent Amount Payable], 0)

Column.Name: Net Payment Certified
Column.Formula: [This Claim Total] - [Less Retention Sum] //[Total Amount Payable to Date] - [Less Net Value Certified at Previous Progress Certificate]

Column.Name: Tax
Column.Formula: [Net Payment Certified] / 100 * [Tax Percentage]

Column.Name: Total Net Amount Payable
Column.Formula: [Net Payment Certified] + [Tax]

Column.Name: Value of Completed Work
Column.Formula: IF( [% Comp] = 0, 0, [Contract Amount] * ([% Comp] / 100) )

Column.Name: Total Value
Column.Formula: SUM(EACH[Amount Claimed]) //SUM(EACH[Value of Completed Work])

Column.Name: Reminder Date
Column.Formula: [Date of Issue]+10

Column.Name: Schedule Item
Column.Formula: [Section Heading ID] & "." & ARRAY_LENGTH(ARRAY_WHERE(EACH [Section Heading ID],$(i, item) AND($i <= [LineNumber], $item = [Section Heading ID]#[LineNumber]))) - 1

Column.Name: Schedule Of Rates RecordID
Column.Formula: IFERROR( DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Schedule of Rates", "[LineNumber] = 1", HASH("parent", ARRAY("Contract", [Contract RecordID])) ), NULL() )

Column.Name: This Invoice Value
Section Heading ID
% Movement
Movement text
Previous Payment Certificate RecordID
Column.Formula: IFERROR( DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Payment Certificate", "[ClaimID] < " & [ClaimID] & " AND [Contract RecordID] = " & [Contract RecordID], HASH("sort", "[DateCreated] DESC") ), NULL() )

Column.Name: Next Payment Certificate RecordID
Column.Formula: IFERROR( DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Payment Certificate", "[ClaimID] > " & [ClaimID] & " AND [Contract RecordID] = " & [Contract RecordID], HASH("sort", "[DateCreated] ASC") ), NULL() )

Column.Name: Number of Payment Certificates
Column.Formula: IFERROR( ARRAY_FIRST(ARRAY_FIRST(DB_REPORT( "COUNT([RecordID])", "Payment Certificate", "[LineNumber] = 1" & " AND [Contract RecordID] = " & [Contract RecordID] ))), NULL() )

Column.Name: Vendor Access Enabled
Column.Formula: IFERROR( DB_LOOKUP( "Vendor Access Enabled", "Contract", "[RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Contract RecordID]) ), NULL() )

Column.Name: Enabled Vendor Actions
Column.Formula: IFERROR( DB_LOOKUP( "Enabled Vendor Actions", "Contract", "[RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Contract RecordID]) ), NULL() )

Column.Name: Default Tax Percentage
Claim Amount
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( AND( $thisValue > [Remaining Amount]#[LineNumber], [Schedule Of Rates RecordID] <> NULL(), [Section Heading] <> TRUE, [Qty or Amt] = "Amount" ), "Claim Amount cannot exceed Remaining Amount", TRUE )
Column.Formula:
IF( [Qty or Amt] = "Quantity", [Claim Quantity] * [Rate],
[Claim Amount] )

Column.Name: Claim Quantity
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( AND( $thisValue > [Remaining Quantity]#[LineNumber], [Schedule Of Rates RecordID] <> NULL(), [Section Heading] <> TRUE, [Qty or Amt] = "Quantity" ), "Claim Quantity cannot exceed Remaining Quantity" )

Column.Name: Qty or Amt
Column.Formula:
IF( [Section Heading] == TRUE, NULL(),
COALESCE([Qty or Amt], "Quantity") )

Column.Name: Amount Claimed
Column.Formula: [Contract Amount] - [Remaining Amount] + [Claim Amount]

Column.Name: Quantity Claimed
Column.Formula: [Quantity] - [Remaining Quantity] + [Claim Quantity]

Column.Name: This Claim Total
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( $thisValue = 0, "Claim cannot be submitted with 0 value", TRUE )

Column.Name: Approval Not Required
Column.DefaultValueFormula: DB_LOOKUP( "Not Required", "Approval Workflow", HASH("Submission Type", "Payment Certificate", "LineNumber", 1) )

Column.Name: Submission Count
Column.Formula: ARRAY_FIRST(ARRAY_FIRST( DB_REPORT( "MAX([Round])", "Submission", "[LineNumber] = 1", HASH("parent", ARRAY([EFormType], [RecordID])) ) ))

Column.Name: Pending Submission
Column.Formula: DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Submission", "[Status] IN ('Draft', 'Submitted') ", HASH("parent", ARRAY(EFormType, RecordID)) )>0

Column.Name: Submission Round
Column.Formula: COALESCE([Submission Round], [Submission Count])

Column.Name: Contract Balance
Column.Formula: [Adjusted Contract Sum] - [Previous Net Payment] //total paid upto not including this claim - [Net Payment Certified] // this claim

Column.Name: Previous Net Payment
Previous Retention
Column.Formula: ARRAY_FIRST( ARRAY_FIRST( DB_REPORT( "SUM([Less Retention Sum])", "Payment Certificate", "[Status] = 'Approved' AND [LineNumber] = 1 AND [RecordID] < " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([RecordID]), HASH("parent", ARRAY("Contract", [Contract RecordID])) ) ))

Column.Name: Schedule Item - Rate Only
Column.Formula: [Section Heading ID - Rate Only] & "." & ARRAY_LENGTH(ARRAY_WHERE(EACH [Section Heading ID - Rate Only],$(i, item) AND($i <= [LineNumber], $item = [Section Heading ID - Rate Only]#[LineNumber]))) - 1

Column.Name: Section Heading ID - Rate Only
Amount Claimed - Rate Only
This Claim Subtotal - Rate Only
Column.Formula: SUM ( EACH [Claim Amount - Rate Only])

Column.Name: Total Value - Rate Only
Column.Formula: SUM(EACH[Amount Claimed - Rate Only])

Column.Name: This Claim Subtotal
Column.Formula: SUM ( EACH [Claim Amount])

Column.Name: Lump Sum Type
Mail Merge Options - Document Selection
Column.Formula: COALESCE([Mail Merge Options - Document Selection], ARRAY_FIRST(HASH_GET([Mail Merge Options], "Custom Templates")))

Column.Name: Mail Merge Options
Parent Structure
Parent Chain
Column.Formula: HASH_GET([Parent Structure], "Parent Chain")

Column.Name: Original Contract Sum Incl. Tax
Column.Formula: IFERROR( DB_LOOKUP( "Initial Contract Value Incl. Tax", "Contract", "[RecordID] = " & [Contract RecordID] ), 0 )

Column.Name: Approved Variations Incl. Tax
Adjusted Contract Sum Incl. Tax
Column.Formula: [Original Contract Sum Incl. Tax] + [Approved Variations Incl. Tax]

Column.Name: This Claim Total Incl. Tax
Column.Formula: [This Claim Total] + (([This Claim Total]/100) * [Tax Percentage])

Column.Name: Less Retention Sum Incl. Tax
Column.Formula: [Less Retention Sum] + (([Less Retention Sum]/100) * [Tax Percentage])

Column.Name: Previous Net Payment Incl. Tax
Previous Retention Incl. Tax
Column.Formula: ARRAY_FIRST( ARRAY_FIRST( DB_REPORT( "SUM([Less Retention Sum Incl. Tax])", "Payment Certificate", "[Status] = 'Approved' AND [LineNumber] = 1 AND [RecordID] < " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([RecordID]), HASH("parent", ARRAY("Contract", [Contract RecordID])) ) ))

Column.Name: Contract Balance Incl. Tax
Column.Formula: [Adjusted Contract Sum Incl. Tax] - [Previous Net Payment Incl. Tax] //total paid upto not including this claim - [Total Net Amount Payable] // this claim

MergeField.Name: Has No Schedule - Work Items
MergeField.Formula: LET $condition := [Schedule Of Rates RecordID] == NULL(); RETURN $condition

MergeField.Name: Schedule - Rates Only
Has Schedule - Rates Only
Invoice Items
MergeField.Formula:
LET $data := ARRAY_TRANSPOSE( ARRAY( EACH [Schedule Item], EACH [Item Description], EACH [Contract Amount], EACH [Quantity], EACH [Unit], EACH [Rate],
LET $percentComplete := EACH [% Comp]; RETURN ARRAY_SELECT($percentComplete, $(i, item) $item / 100),
EACH [Value of Completed Work] ) );
RETURN $data

MergeField.Name: Has Schedule - Amount Type LumpSum
Has Schedule - LumpSum
Schedule - LumpSum
No Schedule - Work Items
Approver Data
MergeField.Formula:
LET $submissionData := DB_LOOKUPALL( ARRAY("Approver Audit Name","Approver Decision","Approver Decision Date"), "Submission", "[Parent RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([RecordID]) & "AND [Parent EFormType] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([EFormType]) & "AND [Round] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Submission Count]) );
RETURN $submissionData

MergeField.Name: Schedule - Amount Type LumpSum

Label.Text: Title or name of the parent agreement
Unique reference number for the parent agreement
Reference number or claim ID for this payment certificate against the contract
The total net amount payable for this payment certificate
Date this payment certificate was issued

Block.HeadingText: Quanitity - Lump Sum Items with Schedule

Binding.Expression:
IF( AND( [Claim Amount]#[LineNumber] > [Remaining Amount]#[LineNumber], [Qty or Amt] = "Quantity" ), "#c10000", "#E0E0E0"
)

FieldEntry.Formula:
IF( [Qty or Amt] = "Quantity", [Rate] * [Claim Quantity],
[% Movement] * [Contract Amount]/100 )

Binding.Expression: AND( [Schedule Of Rates RecordID] <> NULL(), [Lump Sum Type] = "Quantity", OR( [Type] = "Lump Sum", [Type] = "Mix" ) )

Block.HeadingText: Amount - Lump Sum Items with Schedule

Binding.Expression:
IF( AND( [Claim Amount]#[LineNumber] > [Remaining Amount]#[LineNumber], [Qty or Amt] = "Amount" ), "#c10000", "#E0E0E0"
)

FieldEntry.Formula:
IF( [Qty or Amt] = "Quantity", [Rate] * [Claim Quantity],
[% Movement] * [Contract Amount]/100 )

Binding.Expression: AND( [Schedule Of Rates RecordID] <> NULL(), [Lump Sum Type] = "Amount", OR( [Type] = "Lump Sum", [Type] = "Mix" ) )

Block.HeadingText: Both - Lump Sum Items with Schedule

Binding.Expression: IF( [Qty or Amt] = "Quantity", NUMBERFORMAT([Remaining Quantity]), NUMBERFORMAT([Remaining Amount], "C") )

IF( AND( [Claim Amount]#[LineNumber] > [Remaining Amount]#[LineNumber], [Qty or Amt] = "Quantity" ), "#c10000", "#E0E0E0"
)

IF( AND( [Claim Amount]#[LineNumber] > [Remaining Amount]#[LineNumber], [Qty or Amt] = "Amount" ), "#c10000", "#E0E0E0"
)

FieldEntry.Formula:
IF( [Qty or Amt] = "Quantity", [Rate] * [Claim Quantity],
[% Movement] * [Contract Amount]/100 )

Binding.Expression: AND( [Schedule Of Rates RecordID] <> NULL(), [Lump Sum Type] = "Both", OR( [Type] = "Lump Sum", [Type] = "Mix" ) )
AND( [Section Heading - Rate Only], ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Item Description - Rate Only]) > [LineNumber] )
AND( NOT([Section Heading - Rate Only]), ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Item Description - Rate Only]) > [LineNumber] )
AND( [Schedule Of Rates RecordID] <> NULL(), OR( [Type] = "Rate Only", [Type] = "Mix" ) )

Block.HeadingText: Works Description for Certificate without Schedule

Binding.Expression:
"
"
AND( [Schedule Of Rates RecordID] <> NULL(), [Type] = "Lump Sum" )

"
"
AND( [Schedule Of Rates RecordID] <> NULL(), [Type] = "Rate Only" )

"
"
NUMBERFORMAT(ROUND([This Claim Subtotal] + [This Claim Subtotal - Rate Only], 2), "C")

Label.Text: Enter the tax percentage applicable to this payment certificate
Enter any retention amount applicable to this payment certificate excluding tax
Enter a reference number for approvals that happened outside of the system

Binding.Expression: AND( [Schedule Of Rates RecordID] <> NULL(), EBMS_IS_USER_IN_ROLE( EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER(), "Everyone" ) )

Label.Text: Payment certificate approval is in progress.
Title or name of the parent agreement
Unique reference number for the parent agreement
Reference number or claim ID for this payment certificate against the contract
The total net amount payable for this payment certificate including tax
Date this payment certificate was issued

Block.HeadingText: Quanitity - Lump Sum Items with Schedule

Binding.Expression:
IF( AND( [Claim Amount]#[LineNumber] > [Remaining Amount]#[LineNumber], [Qty or Amt] = "Quantity" ), "#c10000", "#E0E0E0"
)

FieldEntry.Formula:
IF( [Qty or Amt] = "Quantity", [Rate] * [Claim Quantity],
[% Movement] * [Contract Amount]/100 )

Binding.Expression: AND( [Schedule Of Rates RecordID] <> NULL(), [Navigation] == "Claim", [Lump Sum Type] = "Quantity", OR( [Type] = "Lump Sum", [Type] = "Mix" ) )

Block.HeadingText: Amount - Lump Sum Items with Schedule

Binding.Expression:
IF( AND( [Claim Amount]#[LineNumber] > [Remaining Amount]#[LineNumber], [Qty or Amt] = "Amount" ), "#c10000", "#E0E0E0"
)

FieldEntry.Formula:
IF( [Qty or Amt] = "Quantity", [Rate] * [Claim Quantity],
[% Movement] * [Contract Amount]/100 )

Binding.Expression: AND( [Schedule Of Rates RecordID] <> NULL(), [Navigation] == "Claim", [Lump Sum Type] = "Amount", OR( [Type] = "Lump Sum", [Type] = "Mix" ) )

Block.HeadingText: Both - Lump Sum Items with Schedule

Binding.Expression: IF( [Qty or Amt] = "Quantity", NUMBERFORMAT([Remaining Quantity]), NUMBERFORMAT([Remaining Amount], "C") )

IF( AND( [Claim Amount]#[LineNumber] > [Remaining Amount]#[LineNumber], [Qty or Amt] = "Quantity" ), "#c10000", "#E0E0E0"
)

IF( AND( [Claim Amount]#[LineNumber] > [Remaining Amount]#[LineNumber], [Qty or Amt] = "Amount" ), "#c10000", "#E0E0E0"
)

FieldEntry.Formula:
IF( [Qty or Amt] = "Quantity", [Rate] * [Claim Quantity],
[% Movement] * [Contract Amount]/100 )

Binding.Expression: AND( [Schedule Of Rates RecordID] <> NULL(), [Navigation] == "Claim", [Lump Sum Type] = "Both", OR( [Type] = "Lump Sum", [Type] = "Mix" ) )
AND( [Section Heading - Rate Only], ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Item Description - Rate Only]) > [LineNumber] )
AND( NOT([Section Heading - Rate Only]), ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Item Description - Rate Only]) > [LineNumber] )
AND( [Schedule Of Rates RecordID] <> NULL(), [Navigation] == "Claim", OR( [Type] = "Rate Only", [Type] = "Mix" ) )

Information.Text: Press this if the Schedule values have changed after the time that this Certificate was raised

Binding.Expression: AND( [Schedule Of Rates RecordID] <> NULL(), [Navigation] == "Claim", [Status] <> "Approved", [Pending Submission] <> TRUE, EBMS_IS_USER_IN_ROLE( EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER(), "Everyone" ) )

Button.Text: Get line items from most recent certificate

FieldEntry.Formula: ARRAY_TRANSPOSE( DB_LOOKUPALL( ARRAY( "Schedule Item", "Item Description", "Claim Amount", "Claim Quantity", "Unit", "Rate", "Qty or Amt" ), "Payment Certificate", "[RecordID] = " & [Previous Payment Certificate RecordID] & " AND [Contract RecordID] = " & [Contract RecordID] ) )

Block.HeadingText: Pull Details from Most Recent Claim

Binding.Expression: AND( [Schedule Of Rates RecordID] == NULL(), [ClaimID] > 1, [Line Items Retrieved] <> TRUE, [Navigation] == "Claim", [Status] <> "Approved", [Pending Submission] <> TRUE )

Block.HeadingText: Works Description for Certificate without Schedule

Binding.Expression:
"
"
AND( [Schedule Of Rates RecordID] <> NULL(), [Navigation] == "Claim", [Type] = "Lump Sum" )

"
"
AND( [Schedule Of Rates RecordID] <> NULL(), [Navigation] == "Claim", [Type] = "Rate Only" )

"
"
NUMBERFORMAT(ROUND([This Claim Subtotal] + [This Claim Subtotal - Rate Only], 2), "C")

Label.Text: Enter the tax percentage applicable to this payment certificate
Enter any retention amount applicable to this payment certificate excluding tax

Binding.Expression:
"
"

"
"

Label.Text: Enter a reference number for approvals that happened outside of the system

Binding.Expression:
IF( [Status] = "Approved", "View submission",
[Pending Submission] == TRUE, //checks if any child submission record is in draft or submitted "Check status and details",
[Submission Count] >=1, "Prepare approval resubmission",
"Prepare approval submission" )

TextCriterion.Text: [Type] = 'Payment Certificate'

CASE WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Approved (Final)' THEN '#0b732b'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Rejected' THEN '#900000'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Pending' THEN '#ffffff'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'In Progress' THEN '#ffff00'
ELSE '#efefef' END

CASE WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Approved (Final)' THEN 'white'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Rejected' THEN 'white'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Cancelled' THEN '#b3b3b3'
WHEN [Status] = 'Approved' THEN '#0b732b'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Approved' THEN '#00a06d'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'In Progress' THEN 'black'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Pending' THEN 'black'
ELSE 'black' END

Binding.Expression:
LET $set := ARRAY_SELECT( RANGE(1, [Submission Count]), $(i,item) HASH( "value", $item, "text", $item ) );
RETURN ARRAY_CONCAT( HASH("value", 0, "text", "All"), $set )

Label.Text: Select the type of mail merge document to view or generate

Binding.Expression: "This will generate a " & LOWER([Mail Merge Purpose]) & " document that includes high level details of this " & LOWER([EFormType]) & "."

RecordFile.RecordIDFormula: DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Mail Merge Template", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1" & " AND [Reference] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Mail Merge Purpose]) & " AND [Context EFormType] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([EFormType]) )

Binding.Expression: AND( [Mail Merge Options - Document Selection] <> NULL, HASH_GET([Mail Merge Options - Document Selection], "FileName") <> [Mail Merge Purpose] )
AND( [Mail Merge Visible] = TRUE, ARRAY_LENGTH(HASH_GET([Mail Merge Options], "Custom Templates")) = 0, [Navigation] = "Documents" )
"This will generate a " & LOWER([Mail Merge Purpose]) & " document that includes high level details of this " & LOWER([EFormType]) & "."

RecordFile.RecordIDFormula: DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Mail Merge Template", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1" & " AND [Reference] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Mail Merge Purpose]) & " AND [Context EFormType] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([EFormType]) )

Binding.Expression: AND( [Mail Merge Options - Document Selection] <> NULL, HASH_GET([Mail Merge Options - Document Selection], "FileName") <> [Mail Merge Purpose] )

Label.Text: Select a template to generate the document from

Binding.Expression: AND( [Mail Merge Visible] = TRUE, ARRAY_LENGTH(HASH_GET([Mail Merge Options], "Custom Templates")) > 0, [Navigation] = "Documents" )

TextCriterion.Text: [LineNumber] = 1

Binding.Expression: "This will generate a " & LOWER([Mail Merge Purpose]) & " document that includes high level details of this " & LOWER([EFormType]) & "."

RecordFile.RecordIDFormula: DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Mail Merge Template", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1" & " AND [Reference] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Mail Merge Purpose]) & " AND [Context EFormType] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([EFormType]) )

Binding.Expression: AND( [Mail Merge Options - Document Selection] <> NULL, HASH_GET([Mail Merge Options - Document Selection], "FileName") <> [Mail Merge Purpose] )
"This will generate a " & LOWER([Mail Merge Purpose]) & " document that includes high level details of this " & LOWER([EFormType]) & "."

RecordFile.RecordIDFormula: DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Mail Merge Template", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1" & " AND [Reference] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Mail Merge Purpose]) & " AND [Context EFormType] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([EFormType]) )

Binding.Expression: AND( [Mail Merge Options - Document Selection] <> NULL, HASH_GET([Mail Merge Options - Document Selection], "FileName") <> [Mail Merge Purpose] )

TextCriterion.Text: (STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Payment Certificate' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Parent RecordID] = [RecordID] AND [To].[Status] <> 'Draft' ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Payment Certificate' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Payment Certificate' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Record Officers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Executive Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Status] <> 'Draft' ) GET COUNT(1)>0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Payment Certificate' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Record Officers'
STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Payment Certificate' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] GET COUNT(1)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Managers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Risk Managers'
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Parent RecordID] = [RecordID] AND [To].[Status] <> 'Draft' ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Payment Certificate' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Payment Certificate' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

CASE
--Check if user is in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is a vendor account, and return if they are the vendor for this record and if vendor access is enabled WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Accounts' THEN ( (STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Payment Certificate' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 AND ( -- If enabled, check if user is a Contact for the vendor (STEP TO [Contact] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[Vendor RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
OR
-- Check if user is the primary account for the vendor (STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 ) )
-- Check if user is an approver on an in progress submission for this record, assuming guest approver WHEN ( STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Parent RecordID] = [RecordID] AND [Status] = 'Submitted' ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Status] <> 'Draft' ) GET COUNT(1)>0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Payment Certificate' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Payment Certificate' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Payment Certificate' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Payment Certificate' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Payment Certificate' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Business Partners'
STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Parent RecordID] = [RecordID] AND [To].[Status] <> 'Draft' ) GET COUNT(1) > 0

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Payment Certificate' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Business Partners'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Payment Certificate' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

CASE
--Check if user is in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' THEN TRUE
-- If Contract RecordID is not populated, fall back to allow Originator access WHEN [Contract RecordID] IS EMPTY THEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
-- Check if user is listed in role on parent record WHEN ( STEP TO [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CASE --check that the user is in a role which always has access to the contract WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] THEN TRUE --check that the contract is not restricted, and the user is in one of these roles in addition WHEN [To].[Restricted] <> TRUE AND ( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' ) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is a vendor account, and return if they are the vendor for this record and if vendor access is enabled WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Accounts' THEN ( (STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Payment Certificate' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 AND ( -- If enabled, check if user is a Contact for the vendor (STEP TO [Contact] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[Vendor RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
OR
-- Check if user is the primary account for the vendor (STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 ) )
-- Check if user is an approver on an in progress submission for this record WHEN ( STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Parent RecordID] = [RecordID] AND [To].[Status] = 'Submitted' ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END

CASE
--Check if user is in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' THEN TRUE
-- If Contract RecordID is not populated, fall back to allow Originator access WHEN [Contract RecordID] IS EMPTY THEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
-- Check if user is listed in role on parent record WHEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is a vendor account, and return if they are the vendor for this record and if vendor access is enabled WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Accounts' THEN ( (STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Payment Certificate' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 AND ( -- If enabled, check if user is a Contact for the vendor (STEP TO [Contact] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[Vendor RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
OR
-- Check if user is the primary account for the vendor (STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 ) )
ELSE FALSE END

FieldEntry.Formula: HASH_GET($eventargs, "Previous Submission Round")//this will be 0 for the first round of submission + 1
HASH_GET($eventargs, "Previous Submission RecordID") //it will be null for the first roundof submission

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Call: Link Next Round (on last submission)

FormulaDrivenChangeFieldValues.Description: Load Type, Lump sum Type, Lump sum Items
